short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Microsoft Copilot sidebar ported from Edge to Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension let you use Microsoft Copilot in Chrome side panel, with context of the webpage you're viewing. Works the same as Copilot sidebar in Edge browser.

What is Copilot in Edge?

Microsoft Copilot is an AI-powered assistant for Microsoft Edge that helps you create, find, and do more on the web. It is designed to be a centralized AI assistant for Edge users, and it can be used to trigger browser-related features by typing in the chat.

Although Copilot is only available in Microsoft Edge browser, this unofficial extension brings it to Chrome browsers! So you can enjoy full featured Copilot in your daily Chrome browser too.

Source code: https://github.com/wong2/bing-sidebar-for-chrome
